text: The ECW World Heavyweight Championship, later known simply as the ECW Championship was a professional wrestling world championship. It was competed for in Extreme Championship Wrestling (ECW) from 1992 to 2001 and in World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) from 2006 to 2010, on their ECW brand. == Other websites == * Title History at WWE.com Category:World Wrestling Entertainment championships Category:Extreme Championship Wrestling
title: ECW World Heavyweight Championship
